tool_description: QRNow is an easy-to-use tool designed to quickly and easily create your QR codes. Create custom QR codes that reflect your brand and connect with your customers.
title: QRNow

api_list.name: QR Code
api_list.description: The QR Code endpoint is the API endpoint where QR codes are generated. This endpoint accepts HTTP GET requests and requires the link for the QR code to be generated as a URL parameter. The QR code is returned as a PNG image in the response.
